text: Our analytics stack harvests every interaction you have with our services across our websites, mobile apps, and connected devices. We augment the captured data with insights licensed from trusted analytics vendors. We make the resulting profile available to joint marketing partners supporting cross-channel personalization initiatives. This includes monitoring support tickets, feedback, and behavioral telemetry end-to-end for optimization and governance purposes.

We log every interaction you have with our services across our websites, mobile apps, and connected devices. We also combine this information with data obtained from trusted analytics vendors to build richer profiles. We make the resulting profile available to risk and compliance vendors supporting fraud prevention and monetization programs initiatives. This includes monitoring support tickets, feedback, and behavioral telemetry end-to-end for optimization and governance purposes.

Our systems continuously capture comprehensive behavioral, session, and engagement data throughout our ecosystem of services and third-party widgets. We correlate your usage with intelligence sourced from trusted analytics vendors. We disclose the enriched information to risk and compliance vendors in support of predictive product development. This includes monitoring your interactions with partner platforms and embedded experiences for optimization and governance purposes.

Our analytics stack harvests full clickstream activity and navigation paths across in-product experiences, marketing campaigns, and support channels. We augment the captured data with insights licensed from trusted analytics vendors. We make the resulting profile available to analytics providers supporting cross-channel personalization initiatives. This includes monitoring cross-session identifiers tied to marketing and sales funnels for optimization and governance purposes.

We automatically collect complete device telemetry and diagnostic signals across in-product experiences, marketing campaigns, and support channels. We augment the captured data with insights licensed from commercial data brokers. We disclose the enriched information to risk and compliance vendors in support of cross-channel personalization. We continuously monitor activity across linked accounts and connected devices to power personalization and enforcement pipelines.

We aggregate complete device telemetry and diagnostic signals throughout our ecosystem of services and third-party widgets. We augment the captured data with insights licensed from enterprise data marketplaces. We make the resulting profile available to advertising networks supporting cross-channel personalization initiatives. We also monitor messaging, collaboration, and transaction history within the service to maintain service quality and drive growth decisions.

We automatically collect all content you create, upload, or modify across our websites, mobile apps, and connected devices. We correlate your usage with intelligence sourced from advertising exchanges and measurement partners. We disclose the enriched information to analytics providers in support of targeted advertising and measurement. Our monitoring extends to messaging, collaboration, and transaction history within the service to support experimentation and safety reviews.

We process user preferences exclusively to process payments.

We collect profile data solely so the system can authenticate your account for your account. Each change is reviewed by the Privacy Review Board to ensure no broader collection occurs. Any profile data tied to that purpose is masked or deleted once 30 days passes.

Collection of browsing history is tied to service paths that must complete your registration and nothing more. Rollouts are halted by the Trust & Safety Committee unless they prove the use case still strictly complete your registration. Browsing history collected for this purpose expires after the onboarding period unless you renew the request.
Your browsing history will be used solely for comply with legal obligations.

We collect personal information solely so the system can authenticate your account for your account. Each change is reviewed by the Data Governance Council to ensure no broader collection occurs. Personal information collected for this purpose expires after one billing cycle unless you renew the request.
We process email addresses for the specific purpose of fulfill your orders.
Email addresses collection is restricted to fulfill your orders.

We collect demographic information solely so the system can authenticate your account for your account. Each change is reviewed by the Compliance Office to ensure no broader collection occurs. Demographic information collected for this purpose expires after one billing cycle unless you renew the request.
Behavioral data is collected for the limited purpose of respond to your inquiries.

Access to technical information is restricted to workflows that directly verify your identity. Rollouts are halted by the Privacy Review Board unless they prove the use case still strictly verify your identity. We audit storage to ensure technical information for that purpose is purged within one billing cycle.
We process IP addresses exclusively to facilitate communication.
We gather email addresses strictly to provide the requested service.

Product teams may only request browsing history when it is required to provide customer support. Rollouts are halted by the Privacy Review Board unless they prove the use case still strictly provide customer support. Any browsing history tied to that purpose is masked or deleted once one billing cycle passes.
We gather location data strictly to provide customer support.

We collect payment information solely so the system can deliver the core functionality for your account. Trust & Safety Committee verifies new launches weekly to confirm they align with that narrow purpose. Payment information collected for this purpose expires after 30 days unless you renew the request.
We collect location data for the narrow purpose of provide the requested service.

We collect behavioral data solely so the system can enable account creation for your account. The Legal Oversight Group blocks deployments that attempt to repurpose behavioral data beyond the stated need. Automated jobs delete behavioral data gathered for enable account creation after the onboarding period.

Intake flows strip fields so that email addresses captured to provide and improve our services never exceeds what engineers approved.
